feed.title: InvenTree
feed.subtitle: InvenTree is an open-source inventory management system which provides intuitive parts management and stock control. It is at the center of an ecosystem of addins for EDA tools, API wrapper, deeply integrated plugins and 3rd party tools.

entry.title: New Barcode Features
entry.summary: Integrating barcode scanning into your InvenTree workflow can provide major efficiency improvements. To help streamline inventory management processes, the InvenTree development community has recently introduced some major new barcode features.

entry.title: 0.12.8 Bugfix Release
entry.summary: The InvenTree development team is proud to announce the release of version 0.12.8, which provides fixes for a number of bugs reported by our community of users.

entry.title: KiCad Integration
entry.summary: In the world of electronics design and PCB (Printed Circuit Board) development, KiCad has been a go-to tool for engineers and hobbyists alike. KiCad is a very popular and capable tool, and has continually evolved to meet the changing needs of its users.

entry.title: User Interface Refactor
entry.summary: The InvenTree development team is thrilled to share some exciting news about the ongoing efforts to significantly overhaul our user interface. To provide a major facelift to InvenTree, we are migrating our entire user interface to the React framework.

entry.title: 0.12.0 Stable Release
entry.summary: Once again, itâ€™s time to announce a new stable release! The InvenTree development team, aided by a number of new contributors, are pleased to announce a new stable release version - 0.12.0.

entry.title: 0.11.0 Stable Release
entry.summary: The InvenTree development team is proud to announce the 0.11.0 stable release!

entry.title: 0.10.1 Bugfix Release
entry.summary: The InvenTree development team is pleased to announce the 0.10.1 bugfix release.

entry.title: 0.10.0 Stable Release
entry.summary: The InvenTree development team is proud to announce the 0.10.0 stable release!

entry.title: Starting the Plugin List
entry.summary: Recently a new feature was launched: A central plugin list.

entry.title: 2022 in Review
entry.summary: 2022 was a huge year for the InvenTree project.
